I got 2 questions:

2.Is this rar file corrupted?

Thanks for this torrent, I love this game :D

But I got a problem, the game works fine but is there a way to install patches for this game. If I want to install patch v1.3 it says "Europa Universalis III is not installed on your computer. Please install the game before installing the update. The installation will now exit!" 

Is there a way to get around this, or a fix?
When I tried installing the game , my AVG Resident Shield said it found "Worm/Generic.DNA" care to explain?
giliath - Download the patch from a mirror, not the program.
